Title: Sing revolutionary songs, advance victoriously
Publisher: Sichuan renmin chubanshe (四川人民出版社)
Notes: The two revolutionary songs, in the back and with musical notation, are "L'Internationale" (Guojige, 国际歌) and "The Three Rules of Discipline and Eight Points for Attention" (San da jilü baxiang zhuyi, 三大纪律八项注意).
Tags: Three Rules of Discipline and the Eight Points for Attention
